events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it carefully.
Your profile has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your application and your qualifications meet the basic requirements for our software engineer role.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions. We're excited to move forward with your application.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM. Please prepare to discuss your coding skills and past projects.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong performance on problem-solving and system design questions.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 14th at 11 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well; we discussed your career goals and how you would fit within our company's culture.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer; we are glad you find the terms satisfactory and are eager to join our team.
You have officially accepted the job offer. We look forward to welcoming you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started, including access setup, introduction to the team, and first-day orientation.
All recruitment activities are now complete as you have officially joined our organization as a Software Engineer.
